TopicTitle: Is there any way to check the role of a Kerbal while in flight?

Articles.Content: What the thread title says. I can't seem to find a way to do this. Hopefully someone will chime in with some obvious thing that I missed and I'll feel silly
Yeah hit map view (m) and click the Kerbal icon the right side of the screen.

Yeah hit map view (m) and click the Kerbal icon the right side of the screen.

Wow I can't believe I didn't try that...I knew it would be something very derp-worthy!

Thank you muchly
It would be good if there was an icon on the kerbal windows on the bottom right so that it is easy to see each role.
Or if they wore different colour/patterned suits

It's a nice thought to have them be able to multi task. Anyone remember Theme Hospital where you could build a lecture room and have a multi-skilled doctor (surgeon, physchiatrist and researcher) train the other junior doctors to harbour the same skills?
